channel.title: Safe PVP location (Camelot PVP source)
channel.description:
I'm working on a new camelot PVP location, and i'm trying to make this bank a safe zone, kinda like the one in camelot..you run in and a 10 second timer counts down. I'm not sure what i would be searching for this, or where. The entire map is all PVP. Anyone mind helping me out?
This is a delta based server if this helps, thanks!

item.title: Safe PVP location (Camelot PVP source)
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

search client.java

search for
code: public void viewTo(int coordX, int coordY) {
viewToX = ((2 * coordX) + 1);
viewToY = ((2 * coordY) + 1);
dirUpdate2Required = true;
updateRequired = true;
}
under that add
code:public boolean nonWild() {
if ((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <= 3431)//i deleted 3508)//(name)
|| (absX >= coords && absX <= (coords) && absY >= (coords) && absY <= (coords))(namehere)

  || (absX >= 2501 && absX <= 2535 && absY >= 3351 && absY <= 3388)//jail
  || (absX >= 3196 && absX <= 3229 && absY >= 3198 && absY <= 3239)//3rdage
	|| heightLevel == 1) {
        return true;

} else {
return false;
}
}

(add the coords in your self) i don’t feel like doing it lol

Read full topic
